und.value: [caption id="attachment_175580" align="alignright" width="268"] Map of the December 7, 2012 earthquake off Japan.[/caption] A magnitude 7.3 earthquake struck off the east coast of Japan on December 7, 2012 at 08:18:24 UTC. Visit the USGS event page on this earthquake. For an estimate of the earthquakeâs impact, visit the USGS Prompt Assessment of Global Earthquakes for Response (PAGER) website.
